articles.description: When she finally managed to speak to someone on the energy company's online forum she was simply asked "would you like to split the payment over 36 months?"
articles.content:
A mum was left shocked after energy giant EDF charged her £336,865 for one month's electricity.
Emma Martin, 40, was checked her account and while her monthly gas payment had remained the same, her … [+1331 chars]
